attributes.action: Pensioners get £113/ week, New Immigrants/ Refugees get £250/ week - REDUCE IMMIGRANT Benefits & Give Pensioners more.
attributes.additional_details:
OLD AGED PENSIONERS (bearing in mind they worked hard and paid their Income Tax and N.I. contributions to the Government all their working life) - Weekly Pension: £113.00

NEW IMMIGRANTS/REFUGEES LIVING IN BRITAIN (No Income Tax and N.I. contributions whatsoever)
Weekly allowance: £250.00

THIS SEEMS DESPERATELY UNFAIR

ALSO, OLD AGED PENSIONER
Weekly Spouse Allowance:£25.00

NEW IMMIGRANTS/REFUGEES LIVING IN BRITAIN
Weekly Spouse Allowance:£225.00

OLD AGED PENSIONER
Additional Weekly Hardship Allowance: £0.00?

NEW IMMIGRANTS/REFUGEES LIVING IN BRITAIN
Additional Weekly Hardship Allowance: £100.00

PENSIONERS are no less hard up than an New Immigrants/Refugees yet they receive nothing.

THESE PAYMENTS AREN'T FAIR TO OLD AGE PENSIONERS.

GOV'T SHOULD REDUCE PAYMENTS TO IMMIGRANTS/ REFUGEES & MONEY SAVED SHOULD GO TO PENSIONERS.
